column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Since I didn't visit the pizzeria personally
column2: I can't comment on service or ambiance. Based on taste alone
column3: we were very happy. Our pizzas arrived all boxed up with dry ice. It was neatly and securely packed. Placed our pizzas in the freezer and when we were ready to enjoy them
column4: we just followed their simple directions. Tried the Pepperoni
column7: and Cheese. They were all delicious and made with quality ingredients. The crust was thin
column8: buttery and crisp. The sauce was smooth
column10: and flavorful. Quality ingredients are used and you can taste the difference. We are incredibly satisfied with our order.
